questions.question: What does math.ceil(3.2) return?
questions.explanation: üîº Ceiling rounds up to nearest integer ‚Üí 4.0 (returns float). floor(3.7)=3.0.

questions.question: How to get current UTC time?
questions.explanation: üåç datetime.utcnow() gives UTC time. datetime.now() gives local time with timezone.
